CustomField.description: If you are using ProductLine Splits and have an Opp Amount Field configured, set this to the API Name of a custom amount field on the Opportunity Product. Refer to admin guide.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you are using ProductLine Splits and have an Opp Amount Field configured, set this to the API Name of a custom amount field on the Opportunity Product. Refer to admin guide.
CustomField.label: Opp Product Amount Field
